line_1: And nae great sight to see, sirs;
line_2: Will never let me be, sirs.

line_1: Will never let me be, sirs.
line_2: And nae great sight to see, sirs;

line_1: As gude as lass can be, sirs;
line_2: Hae a' run wud for me, sirs.

line_1: Hae a' run wud for me, sirs.
line_2: As gude as lass can be, sirs;

line_1: He thinks the day's his sin, sirs;
line_2: He'd find himsel mista'en, sirs.

line_1: He'd find himsel mista'en, sirs.
line_2: He thinks the day's his sin, sirs;

line_1: That I may guess the cause, sirs;
line_2: Dumb Roger's hums and ha's, sirs.

line_1: Dumb Roger's hums and ha's, sirs.
line_2: That I may guess the cause, sirs;

line_1: The blithest lad ye'll see, sirs;
line_2: He'd laugh gin I did die, sirs.

line_1: He'd laugh gin I did die, sirs.
line_2: The blithest lad ye'll see, sirs;

line_1: To talk wi' him is vain, sirs;
line_2: He'd prove that it did rain, sirs.

line_1: He'd prove that it did rain, sirs.
line_2: To talk wi' him is vain, sirs;

line_1: 'Bout sma' things makes a phrase, sirs;
line_2: Ding o'er his joyfu' days, sirs.

line_1: Ding o'er his joyfu' days, sirs.
line_2: 'Bout sma' things makes a phrase, sirs;

line_1: But gude kens wha's the best, sirs;
line_2: And drums out a' the rest, sirs.

line_1: And drums out a' the rest, sirs.
line_2: But gude kens wha's the best, sirs;

line_1: I've had them on their knee, sirs;
line_2: And no to downright me, sirs.

line_1: And no to downright me, sirs.
line_2: I've had them on their knee, sirs;

line_1: They may wear out the knee, sirs;
line_2: But they shall ne'er get me, sirs.

line_1: But they shall ne'er get me, sirs.
line_2: They may wear out the knee, sirs;
